summary.value: The air is cool and still, but you can feel His rage boiling.

data.haunt: When the Hauntee suffers damage from a creature in this scene, they get a one-emotion Bond of hatred towards that creature, replacing another Bond that they have at random. Whenever they attack or cast an offensive spell, each creature they have a Bond of hatred towards suffers @DMG[3 fire] damage. This Haunt cannot be banished except by the end of the scene.
data.ritual: Bring wrath down upon those who have wronged you... but dig two graves.
